item.description:
Your body is a vast expanse and a deep well, capable of experiencing infinite pleasure, and most of us have only scratched the surface of the sensual and erotic pleasure that lies in store for us. This workshop is designed to help you go beyond the limits of what you have experienced thus far, weaving together the realms of sensuality, spirituality, and eroticism.

In this workshop I will be joining forces with Amy Cooper, PhD, clinical sexologist and author of The Everything Orgasm Book, to help you explore new territory in your erotic landscape.

Through experiential exercises you will:

♦ Discover and map out your many erogenous zones
♦ Explore different kinds of sensual stimulation
♦ Learn Tantric energy practices to unlock your orgasmic potential

By the end of the night, you'll have a greater understanding of how to expand erotic pleasure to include your entire body and achieve more extended blissful states. Join us!

Open to all, regardless of relationship status, gender identity or sexual orientation. No previous experience or partner necessary.

Amy Cooper, PhD, Clinical Sexologist, Sexual Enrichment Coach, and author of The Everything Orgasm Book has a private practice in Santa Cruz, California where she helps individuals and couples achieve greater sexual and life satisfaction. She is an international presenter and workshop facilitator, and has appeared on numerous radio shows as an expert on the subject of human sexuality. More information can be found on her website: www.LoveYourSexLife.com

Brynn Bishop is a Tantra Educator and Intimacy Coach with over twenty years experience in the fields of body-mind integration and conscious relating. Through a unique synthesis of diverse modalities, Brynn assists individuals and couples in developing personal empowerment, relational skills and expanded pleasure. She is passionate about helping others increase their capacity for connection and pleasure, and access their full aliveness and passion!
item.how_to_find_us: Enter the building on the left and follow the signs. Longfellow Park is a small loop off Brattle St across from the Longfellow House.
item.name: Erogenous Zones and Expanded Orgasm
